committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to permit access across certain Federal lands in the State of Arkansas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to permit access across the Buffalo National River (park), Arkansas, to certain owners of privately owned lands (as of September 1, 1987) outside the park on an annual fee basis.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to permit access across certain Federal lands in the State of Arkansas, and for other purposes.
